divs: Sighting Detailsmy buddy bob has also seen thease the last few nights 7 aug 25 in the NE he lives in lebanon oregon then 6 on mon 20th in the SE like there were above brownsville or like crow flys crawfordville, the first night they were just like the first post decribed and the first night he only saw themn for 2 min although on the 25th he saw them for a total of 5-6 min then 10 min later there were out for another 5-6min they were dripping some thing off them like candle wax.
